data.message: I think it's great that this campaign focuses on Education! And for those of you whining and asking why the hell you should contribute when you're not from Michigan or even the US, or you're not an Eminem-fan or whatever: well I personally don't have any ties to Michigan either, but I'm still donating because this might promote better education. A more educated population is good because I don't like living in a world with a bunch of stupid people. That's why I support campaigns that enables or improves education - no matter where.
